Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Why are the floating skulls called "Bubbles" and the floating bubbles "Shaboms"?
